Surrounded by them, he was expounding the Dharma.

translated: who know the twelve names of this Great Auspicious Goddess

analyzed: 能受持讀誦修習供養為他宣說。
translated: and are able to uphold, recite, cultivate, and make offerings to them, and expound them to others,
they will be able to eliminate all poverty and karmic hindrances.
One will obtain great wealth and abundance of treasures.
At that time, the eight groups of gods and dragons in the assembly,
with different mouths but the same voice, all said this:
As the World-Honored One has said, it is true and not false.
We wish to hear the twelve names.
We only pray that the World-Honored One, out of great compassion, will explain them.

original: 佛言汝當善聽今為汝說所謂　吉慶　吉祥蓮華　嚴飾　具財　白色　大名稱　蓮華眼　大光曜　施食者　施飲者　寶光　大吉祥　是為十二名號。
analyzed: 佛言汝當善聽今為汝說所謂　吉慶　吉祥蓮華　嚴飾　具財　白色　大名稱　蓮華眼　大光曜　施食者　施飲者　寶光　大吉祥　是為十二名號。
translated: The Buddha said, You should listen well. I will now explain them for you. They are: Auspicious, Blessed Lotus, Adorned, Wealthy, White Color, Great Renown, Lotus Eyes, Great Radiance, Giver of Food, Giver of Drink, Jewel Light, Great Auspiciousness. These are the twelve names.
You should uphold them.
